com.dalingrin.nookcolortweaks.SeekBarPre.android:dialogMessage: Warning: increasing DAC gain can lead to distortion or speaker damage
com.dalingrin.nookcolortweaks.SeekBarPre.android:title: DAC boost

Preference.android:summary: You may need to increase DAC volume to get the external speaker louder. To eliminate headphone hiss/noise, decrease headphone analog gain until you can turn up the Android media volume to at least 80% and still maintain comfortable listening levels.
